about_the_game:
Step into a third person fantasy RPG in a medieval setup, where you can fight against evil enemies. Change between your weapons (swords, axe, katana).

In the kingdom of Kaisho, a land steeped in rich history and guarded by breathtaking landscapes, there lived a young girl named Hana. She was no ordinary girl; she was the kingdom's protector, armed with a legendary katana passed down through generations.

Kaisho had always been a place of peace and tranquility, where its inhabitants thrived in harmony with nature. However, dark clouds loomed on the horizon as evil enemies from distant lands sought to conquer the kingdom and exploit its resources.

Hana's destiny was clear. She was the last in the line of the kingdom's protectors, trained from a young age in the art of the katana. Her father, a wise and skilled warrior, had passed the sacred weapon to her, entrusting her with the responsibility of safeguarding Kaisho from impending doom.

Kaisho had always been a place of peace and tranquility, where its inhabitants thrived in harmony with nature. However, dark clouds loomed on the horizon as evil enemies from distant lands sought to conquer the kingdom and exploit its resources.

Hana's destiny was clear. She was the last in the line of the kingdom's protectors, trained from a young age in the art of the katana. Her father, a wise and skilled warrior, had passed the sacred weapon to her, entrusting her with the responsibility of safeguarding Kaisho from impending doom.
name: KAISHO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I5 | Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Third person fantasy RPG in a fantasy medieval world, sword, katana, axe fighting system where you are a little girl named Hana in the kingdom of Kaisho. Fight against creatures and spiders to free Kaisho from the evil. Step into a fantasy adventure and start your journey. Welcome to Kaisho
